title: Proposed tech park near Moseley heads to Chesterfield Planning Commission - RichmondBizSense
content: Proposed tech park near Moseley heads to Chesterfield Planning Commission  RichmondBizSense
description: The county-initiated proposal would rezone a total of around 2,400 acres, teeing up a technology park on the bulk of the land as well as hundreds of homes and several public facilities on the so-called “Upper Magnolia Green” property.
